Welcome to the Nexsas Affiliate Program! Please read these terms carefully to ensure you fully understand how our program works and
          what is expected.

txt-41504167.text:
As a Nexsas affiliate, you are part of our extended sales team. For every customer you refer who completes a purchase, you'll earn a commission. The more
          you refer, the more you can earn — there's no limit!

txt-e06c704a.text: How will I know if I made a sale?

txt-076602d3.text:
You'll receive a notification when a referred customer makes a purchase. You can also
          track your sales and commissions in real-time from your affiliate dashboard.

txt-4a06affd.text: All payments are processed via PayPal.

txt-4e0325ee.text: Ensure your PayPal account information is correctly set in your affiliate profile.

txt-565aec0e.text: Payouts are made at the end of each month.

txt-1fa81433.text: Commissions must be verified manually before release.

txt-a075ee4d.text: For example, commissions earned in May will be paid by June 30.

txt-4a14a981.text:
When a visitor clicks your link, a 30-day cookie is set. If they complete a purchase
          within that period, you receive the commission — unless another affiliate's link
          overwrites yours.

txt-bbfc5ae7.text: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our team.

txt-889171c2.text:
When you make or attempt to purchase through the Site, we collect information such
                as your name, email address, billing address, shipping address, payment details, and
                any other relevant data necessary to process your order.

txt-7c10b952.text: Process your orders, payments, and generate invoices

txt-268d147c.text: Screen for potential fraud or risks

            your preferences

txt-6501c457.text: Improve and optimize the Site experience

txt-0a616df6.text: Analyze customer interactions for performance tracking

txt-7713938e.text: Screen for potential risk and fraud

txt-dfb88f63.text:
We share your Personal Information with trusted third-party service providers to help us
            operate effectively:

txt-64b4d103.text:
Please note, we do not alter our Site’s data collection practices when we detect a "Do
            Not Track" signal from your browser.

txt-c2965804.text: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA):

txt-863b8756.text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information.

txt-2092b784.text:
We will retain your Order Information for our records unless you ask us to delete this
            information.

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes to our practices or

txt-900a82a8.text:
At Nexsas, we are committed to providing you with the best possible service and
          experience. However, if for any reason our platform does not meet your expectations, we
          offer a simple and hassle-free refund policy.

txt-9e54342c.text:
We are confident that you will love using Nexsas. Still, if you are not fully satisfied, we offer a full refund within 14 days of your
          original purchase — no questions asked.

txt-a5d62e03.text: You are eligible for a full refund if

txt-87966761.text: You request a refund within 14 days from the date of purchase.

txt-94cb2c6e.text:
NestSaaS's Resume Builder is an AI-powered tool that helps you create professional,
              ATS-optimized resumes in minutes. It offers customizable templates, real-time
              suggestions, and industry-specific content to make your resume stand out.

txt-f6b369f5.text: Can recruiters tell if AI wrote my resume?

txt-736f857e.text:
No, recruiters cannot tell if AI wrote your resume. NestSaaS uses advanced AI
              technology to generate natural, human-sounding content that passes ATS systems and
              impresses hiring managers while maintaining authenticity and professionalism.

txt-6193bf5e.text: What formats can I export my resume in?

txt-2d429fa7.text:
You can export your resume in multiple professional formats including PDF, Word
              (DOCX), and plain text. All formats are optimized for ATS systems and maintain perfect
              formatting across different platforms and devices.

txt-74937250.text:
Yes, your information is completely secure. We use enterprise-grade encryption, comply
              with GDPR and CCPA regulations, and never share your personal data with third parties.
              Your resume content remains private and confidential.

txt-33353812.text: Can I use this on mobile?

txt-94df0d69.text:
Absolutely! NestSaaS is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all mobile devices.
              You can create, edit, and download your resume from anywhere using our
              mobile-optimized interface with the same powerful features as the desktop version.

txt-9f488e84.text:
At Nexsas, protecting your data is more than a promise it’s a foundation. Every product
            decision starts with one question: Is this secure for our customers? We take your
            privacy, integrity, and business data protection seriously.

txt-ef9dc523.text:
Our infrastructure is designed with end-to-end encryption, zero-trust access, and
            multi-layer defense systems that meet modern compliance standards. Whether you’re a
            startup or global enterprise, Nexsas ensures your operations run safely and confidently.

txt-ed6447ed.text: We continuously improve our systems through:

txt-990b628d.text: Dedicated Security Experts monitoring and managing platform integrity 24/7.

txt-fc764192.text:
Regular Compliance Audits aligned with industry standards such as ISO 27001, SOC 2,
                and GDPR.

txt-af4488ae.text:
Advanced Threat Detection powered by AI to identify and neutralize risks before they
                escalate.

txt-d465d683.text:
Our cloud platform’s infrastructure and operations are certified compliant with the
            following industry best practice standards and frameworks:

txt-7fec0c32.text:
We believe in full transparency. Every customer gets access to our updated security
            whitepapers, audit results, and incident response procedures—so you always know how your
            data is protected.

txt-093e6d21.text:
Nexsas operates on trusted global cloud partners with built-in redundancy, encrypted
            backups, and continuous uptime monitoring. Our team ensures operational resilience, no
            matter the scale or complexity of your business.

txt-1b2bce0a.text: Take control of your online banking and earn rewards.

txt-b7c0cc11.text:
Online banking platforms provide powerful budgeting tools that categorize your spending,
        track expenses, and help you stay within your financial limits. These tools automatically
        analyze your transactions and provide insights into your spending habits.

txt-37eada7e.text:
Many banks integrate investment account management, allowing you to monitor your portfolio
        performance, execute trades, and access market research all from one convenient platform.

txt-e8600714.text:
With mobile banking apps, you can make contactless payments, send money to friends and
        family instantly, and use digital wallets for secure transactions at merchants worldwide.

txt-510b1340.text: Review and understand your bank's rewards program terms and earning rates

txt-db2ffb99.text: Use your bank's credit card for everyday purchases to maximize points

txt-c72e6937.text: Set up automatic payments and maintain qualifying balances for bonus rewards

          my everyday banking.
